page.title: 11BORWICK
page.content: There are no shops in Borwick.The closest shops are in Carnforth.There is a cluster of five farms in Borwick.Clakes Farm,Beck House,Sanders Farm,Borwick Lodge and Manor Farm.These farms each own a lot of land and animals.Borwick is a quiet,peaceful village with not much traffic passing through.This is a village mainly for elderly or quiet people, who enjoy the countryside.Many of the houses are very old,built around the time of Borwick Hall and built with big blocks of stone.The Lancaster Canal runs alongside the border of Borwick.The nearest railway station for the public is Carnforth which is 2.5 miles away. Lancaster station is 10 miles away.Ribble buses run every two hours through Borwick to Carnforth,Lancaster and Kendal.
